Basic Life Support for Healthcare providers If you need to be certified for CPR to do patient care in  hospital or facility-based setting, or?? if you are a licensed healthcare provider - this certification is mandatory.  ? ? Basic Life Support (BLS) Healthcare Provider   Course designed for the rescuer who has a duty to respond or anyone with the desire for advanced ?CPR knowledge. Course content includes: recognizing and caring for breathing and cardiac ?emergencies in a Adult, Child, and Infant, Two-Rescuer CPR, Airway Obstruction, use of an AED, ?use of Resuscitation Mask and Bag Mask.  ? Upon successful completion, Health Care Provider ?participants will receive an American Heart Association Basic Life Support (BLS) Healthcare ?Provider certificate valid for 2?years. ? ? ? HeartSaver CPR & HeartSaver AED?  The Heartsaver CPR, HeartSaver AED and First Aid courses?are specially designed to train anyone who might be the first to respond in the workplace or community, and can be tailored to address the needs of a specific workplace or group of employees. These courses also provide the skills to effectively assess and maintain life from the critical minutes immediately following an emergency until the arrival of emergency medical services personnel.  Ideal for non-medical professionals such as teachers, personal or fitness trainers, coaches,?and those who work closely with children [day care employees, etc]. Each Certification is Valid for 2 years ? HeartSaver FirstAid  ?
